java/liquibase/diff/Diff.java

00001 package liquibase.diff;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.structure.*;
00005 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00006 
00007 import java.util.HashSet;
00008 import java.util.Set;
00009 
00010 public class Diff {
00011 
00012     private Database baseDatabase;
00013     private Database targetDatabase;
00014 
00015     private DatabaseSnapshot baseSnapshot;
00016     private DatabaseSnapshot targetSnapshot;
00017 
00018     private Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners = new HashSet<DiffStatusListener>();
00019 
00020     public Diff(Database baseDatabase, Database targetDatabase) {
00021         this.baseDatabase = baseDatabase;
00022 
00023         this.targetDatabase = targetDatabase;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public Diff(Database originalDatabase, String schema) throws JDBCException {
00027         targetDatabase = null;
00028 
00029         baseDatabase = originalDatabase;
00030         baseDatabase.setDefaultSchemaName(schema);
00031     }
00032 
00033     public Diff(DatabaseSnapshot baseDatabaseSnapshot, DatabaseSnapshot targetDatabaseSnapshot) {
00034         this.baseSnapshot = baseDatabaseSnapshot;
00035 
00036         this.targetSnapshot = targetDatabaseSnapshot;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void addStatusListener(DiffStatusListener listener) {
00040         statusListeners.add(listener);
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void removeStatusListener(DiffStatusListener listener) {
00044         statusListeners.remove(listener);
00045     }
00046 
00047     public DiffResult compare() throws JDBCException {
00048         if (baseSnapshot == null) {
00049             baseSnapshot = new DatabaseSnapshot(baseDatabase, statusListeners);
00050         }
00051 
00052         if (targetSnapshot == null) {
00053             if (targetDatabase == null) {
00054                 targetSnapshot = new DatabaseSnapshot();
00055             } else {
00056                 targetSnapshot = new DatabaseSnapshot(targetDatabase, statusListeners);
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         DiffResult diffResult = new DiffResult(baseSnapshot, targetSnapshot);
00061         checkVersionInfo(diffResult);
00062         checkTables(diffResult);
00063         checkViews(diffResult);
00064         checkColumns(diffResult);
00065         checkForeignKeys(diffResult);
00066         checkPrimaryKeys(diffResult);
00067         checkIndexes(diffResult);
00068         checkSequences(diffResult);
00069 
00070         return diffResult;
00071     }
00072 
00073     private void checkVersionInfo(DiffResult diffResult) throws JDBCException {
00074 
00075         if (targetDatabase != null) {
00076             diffResult.setProductName(new DiffComparison(baseDatabase.getDatabaseProductName(), targetDatabase.getDatabaseProductName()));
00077             diffResult.setProductVersion(new DiffComparison(baseDatabase.getDatabaseProductVersion(), targetDatabase.getDatabaseProductVersion()));
00078         }
00079 
00080     }
00081 
00082     private void checkTables(DiffResult diffResult) {
00083         for (Table baseTable : baseSnapshot.getTables()) {
00084             if (!targetSnapshot.getTables().contains(baseTable)) {
00085                 diffResult.addMissingTable(baseTable);
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00089         for (Table targetTable : targetSnapshot.getTables()) {
00090             if (!baseSnapshot.getTables().contains(targetTable)) {
00091                 diffResult.addUnexpectedTable(targetTable);
00092             }
00093         }
00094     }
00095 
00096     private void checkViews(DiffResult diffResult) {
00097         for (View baseView : baseSnapshot.getViews()) {
00098             if (!targetSnapshot.getViews().contains(baseView)) {
00099                 diffResult.addMissingView(baseView);
00100             }
00101         }
00102 
00103         for (View targetView : targetSnapshot.getViews()) {
00104             if (!baseSnapshot.getViews().contains(targetView)) {
00105                 diffResult.addUnexpectedView(targetView);
00106             }
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     private void checkColumns(DiffResult diffResult) {
00111         for (Column baseColumn : baseSnapshot.getColumns()) {
00112             if (!targetSnapshot.getColumns().contains(baseColumn)
00113                     && (baseColumn.getTable() == null || !diffResult.getMissingTables().contains(baseColumn.getTable()))
00114                     && (baseColumn.getView() == null || !diffResult.getMissingViews().contains(baseColumn.getView()))
00115                     ) {
00116                 diffResult.addMissingColumn(baseColumn);
00117             }
00118         }
00119 
00120         for (Column targetColumn : targetSnapshot.getColumns()) {
00121             if (!baseSnapshot.getColumns().contains(targetColumn)
00122                     && (targetColumn.getTable() == null || !diffResult.getUnexpectedTables().contains(targetColumn.getTable()))
00123                     && (targetColumn.getView() == null || !diffResult.getUnexpectedViews().contains(targetColumn.getView()))
00124                     ) {
00125                 diffResult.addUnexpectedColumn(targetColumn);
00126             } else
00127             if (targetColumn.getTable() != null && !diffResult.getUnexpectedTables().contains(targetColumn.getTable())) {
00128                 Column baseColumn = baseSnapshot.getColumn(targetColumn.getTable().getName(), targetColumn.getName());
00129 
00130                 if (targetColumn.isDifferent(baseColumn)) {
00131                     diffResult.addChangedColumn(targetColumn);
00132                 }
00133             }
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     private void checkForeignKeys(DiffResult diffResult) {
00138         for (ForeignKey baseFK : baseSnapshot.getForeignKeys()) {
00139             if (!targetSnapshot.getForeignKeys().contains(baseFK)) {
00140                 diffResult.addMissingForeignKey(baseFK);
00141             }
00142         }
00143 
00144         for (ForeignKey targetFK : targetSnapshot.getForeignKeys()) {
00145             if (!baseSnapshot.getForeignKeys().contains(targetFK)) {
00146                 diffResult.addUnexpectedForeignKey(targetFK);
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150 
00151     private void checkIndexes(DiffResult diffResult) {
00152         for (Index baseIndex : baseSnapshot.getIndexes()) {
00153             if (!targetSnapshot.getIndexes().contains(baseIndex)) {
00154                 diffResult.addMissingIndex(baseIndex);
00155             }
00156         }
00157 
00158         for (Index targetIndex : targetSnapshot.getIndexes()) {
00159             if (!baseSnapshot.getIndexes().contains(targetIndex)) {
00160                 diffResult.addUnexpectedIndex(targetIndex);
00161             }
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     private void checkPrimaryKeys(DiffResult diffResult) {
00166         for (PrimaryKey basePrimaryKey : baseSnapshot.getPrimaryKeys()) {
00167             if (!targetSnapshot.getPrimaryKeys().contains(basePrimaryKey)) {
00168                 diffResult.addMissingPrimaryKey(basePrimaryKey);
00169             }
00170         }
00171 
00172         for (PrimaryKey targetPrimaryKey : targetSnapshot.getPrimaryKeys()) {
00173             if (!baseSnapshot.getPrimaryKeys().contains(targetPrimaryKey)) {
00174                 diffResult.addUnexpectedPrimaryKey(targetPrimaryKey);
00175             }
00176         }
00177     }
00178 
00179     private void checkSequences(DiffResult diffResult) {
00180         for (Sequence baseSequence : baseSnapshot.getSequences()) {
00181             if (!targetSnapshot.getSequences().contains(baseSequence)) {
00182                 diffResult.addMissingSequence(baseSequence);
00183             }
00184         }
00185 
00186         for (Sequence targetSequence : targetSnapshot.getSequences()) {
00187             if (!baseSnapshot.getSequences().contains(targetSequence)) {
00188                 diffResult.addUnexpectedSequence(targetSequence);
00189             }
00190         }
00191     }
00192 }
